page.title: 16WHAT TO DO IN CANNICH AREA
page.content:
Organised{shinty}originated in Strathglass and Strathglass shinty club is the oldest club. The Shinty Centenary was held in 1980. Cannich has a very active{Indoor Bowling}Club which attracts members both young and old and lively matches are played against neighbouring clubs. A {Badminton Club}is also run during the winter months and there is a{Football club who use the playing field in the village regularly. The bar in the {hotel}has a pool table and darts can also be played in the hotel.
Considering the area is so far from the nearest main city, the{recreation facilities are reasonably good and possibly more than adequate for such a small population.
